title: Data Scientist
description:
Data Scientist | MNC Client | Hybrid Mode | Gurgaon

Role Responsibilities:




For this position, you are mandatory to have:

BE/BTECH - 4 years to 6 years of work experience in data science and statistical modeling.

Good understanding of Statistics and ML Models development

Proficiency in SQL.

Experience in Python

Experience of working on large data.

Team Handling and Client handling experience.

Should be okay with consulting nature of work, multiple projects of short/long durations, client delivery, mix of business analytics and data science

AIML experience & Statistics basics
ML applications and use cases such as regressions, time series, forecasting, predictive modelling for customer targeting, churn prediction, risk identification, classification algorithms – decision trees, random forest, clustering are preferred.




Nice to Have:

Exposure or working knowledge in building Data Science simulation tools.

Understanding of package development and standalone deployment of Julia based software.

Knowledge of Linux and machine learning algorithms & tools.

Exposure to Kalman Filters, Wavelets, or other DSP techniques

Experience of building dashboards on Power BI or Tableau
